summary: "Spellbinder Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy armor set for all races and both genders. This is the battle regalia of the mighty battlemage Jagar Tharn from the first game in The Elder Scrolls series, Arena.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ak3fj.png[/img][/center]
[center]An Armor mod by Patobek, JackoO, and Hothtrooper44.[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qfXB8.png[/img][/center]
One of the most famous and powerful figures in the history of Tamriel was Jagar Tharn, Imperial Battlemage to Uriel Septim VIII. Though disavowed by the current organization for political reasons, Jagar is known as the first Nightingale and a master thief and mage both. He was also a powerful ally to Mehrunes Dagon in conquering the Battlespire Academy, among countless other history altering feats.

Through seduction and deceit, Jager stole the Staff of Chaos from the Queen Mother of Morrowind and used it to bind the Imperial king, Uriel Septim VIII, in another plane. For ten years the king was bound, and through illusion magic, Jager Tharn took on his image and ruled in his stead unbeknownst to most of the empire. Though his devious reign was cut short by his own apprentice and the staff of Chaos destroyed, the mighty spellbinder's armor outlived the legend.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkpWm.png[/img][/center]
"Spellbinder Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy armor set for all races and both genders. This is the battle regalia of the mighty battlemage Jager Tharn from the first game in The Elder Scrolls series, Arena.

This set has similar statistics to ebony armor, and thus requires the ebony smithing perk to craft. There are five variations of the Spellbinder armor set, all crafted out of fitting materials from the game: Golden Spellbinder Armor, Crimson Spellbinder Armor, Royal Spellbinder Armor, Runic Spellbinder Armor, and Patterned Spellbinder Armor. These sets can only be crafted in the Skyforge, which will help the large number of items presented in this mod from cluttering normal forges.

This armor set is adorned with many details including: a spell book, potions, coin purse, side plates, storage pouch, a scroll satchel, and more. [i][url=http://p3d.in/Qg5fT]Feel free to take a look at the mesh[/url][/i].

This armor is a co-authored piece by:
Patobek - design and assembly in Blender
JackoO - rigging and weighing in Blender
Hothtrooper44 - Nifscope/Creation Kit work and presentation

[center][youtube]HLjJ4AWxkoQ[/youtube]

Feedback on the armor should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and potential fixes.

** If you like it, endorse it! **[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/22peo.png[/img]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/6dItK.png[/img][/center]
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
I do wish to help other mods and the community at large with my work, so don't hold back from asking!

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/iKQR3.png[/img][/center]
Hothtrooper44 - implementation and presentation
Patobek - general design
JackoO - rigging and weighing
TheWitcher5688 - extracting some Witcher assets
Bethesda for Skyrim and it's assets
Most parts of the armor's meshes and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used here with permission. The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved. http://www.cdprojekt.com/
sPINELESjELLY, ScreaminGreenMachine, and Kyokushinoyama for testing and screenshots!
